text: Ion Goriță is a Romanian diplomat and United Nations official. He served as Romania's Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York from 1994 to 2000Arthur S. Banks, Alan J. Day, Thomas C. Muller (eds.), Political Handbook of the World 1997, p. 696, CSA Publications, and as President of the UNICEF Executive Board at the international level in 1996.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF Before his appointment as Permanent Representative to the U.N., he served as Secretary of State (Deputy Foreign Minister) in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.FBIS Daily Report: East Europe, 116–126, p. 23 He was Chairman of the Joint Inspection Unit from 2004 to 2005.Report of the Joint Inspection Unit for 2004 and Programme of Work for 2005, Annex I, p. 12, United Nations ==References== Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Permanent Representatives of Romania to the United Nations Category:Romanian officials of the United Nations
title: Ion Goriță
